titles.title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 57 Old Tappan Road in Tappan, New York, as the "John G Dow Post Office Building.
A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 57 Old Tappan Road in Tappan, New York, as the "John G Dow Post Office Building.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Collins without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 331.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 57 Old Tappan Road in Tappan, New York, as the John G. Dow Post Office Building.
